content.raw:
I've tried adding noise to a depth sensor in the same way it's normally done, adding


```
#!xml

<noise>
  <type>gaussian</type>
  <mean>0.0</mean>
  <stddev>0.05</stddev>
</noise>
```
to the `camera` tag. While this works with a standard camera, if `sensor type="depth"`, it appears not to produce any noise in the resulting rgb image from the depth sensor. I've tried high values for the standard deviation, but it appears to make no difference.

I was actually more interested in setting the noise on the depth data rather than the rgb, but it appears that there is no functionality for that.

The first problem I would consider to be a bug, and the second would be an enhancement that would be generally useful.
